import{useState,useContext}from'react';import{useNavigate,Link}from'react-router-dom';import{AuthContext}from'../contexts/AuthContext';import{authService}from'../services/api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export function Login(){const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[senha,setSenha]=useState('');const[error,setError]=useState('');const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const{dispatch}=useContext(AuthContext);const navigate=useNavigate();async function handleSubmit(e){e.preventDefault();setLoading(true);setError('');try{const{user,token}=await authService.login(email,senha);localStorage.setItem('token',token);localStorage.setItem('user',JSON.stringify(user));dispatch({type:'LOGIN',payload:{user,token}});navigate('/');// Alterado de /home para /
}catch(err){setError('Email ou senha inválidos');}finally{setLoading(false);}}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center bg-darker",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-dark p-8 rounded-lg shadow-xl w-96",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-2xl font-bold text-light mb-6",children:"Login"}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"bg-red-500 text-white p-3 rounded mb-4",children:error}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mb-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",placeholder:"Email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),className:"w-full p-3 rounded bg-darker text-light",required:true})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mb-6",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Senha",value:senha,onChange:e=>setSenha(e.target.value),className:"w-full p-3 rounded bg-darker text-light",required:true,minLength:6})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",disabled:loading,className:"w-full bg-primary text-white p-3 rounded hover:bg-hover transition-colors disabled:opacity-50",children:loading?'Carregando...':'Entrar'})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"text-light text-center mt-4",children:["N\xE3o tem uma conta?",' ',/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/register",className:"text-primary hover:text-hover",children:"Cadastre-se"})]})]})});}
